SELECT a.sys_clinic_id AS sysClinicId, b.`name` AS sysClinicName, b.`code` AS sysClinicCode, a.pem_supplier_id AS pemSupplierId, c.oid AS pemSupplierOid, c.name AS pemSupplierName, c.code AS pemSupplierCode, ROUND(SUM(a.quantity * a.cost_price), 2) AS hsje, ROUND(SUM(a.quantity * (a.cost_price / (100 + a.purchase_tax_rate) * 100)), 2) AS wsje FROM iym_inventory_add a LEFT JOIN sys_clinic b ON a.`sys_clinic_id` = b.`id` LEFT JOIN pem_supplier c ON a.`pem_supplier_id` = c.`id`
(DATE_FORMAT(a.creation_date, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{creationDate[0]} and #{creationDate[1]}) and
(sysClinicId = #{sysClinicId}) and
(b.name like '${sysClinicName}%' or b.code like '${sysClinicName}%') and
(c.name like '${pemSupplierName}%' or c.code like '${pemSupplierName}%') and
a.approve_state=1
GROUP BY a.sys_clinic_id, a.pem_supplier_id ORDER BY a.sys_clinic_id, a.pem_supplier_id
